Hi! My name is Zakarie Hashi, thanks for visiting my site. I completed my [Master's](https://www.linkedin.com/in/zakariehashi/) In [applied statistics]() at Western Michigan n University in  Apr 2018, investigating risk factors associated with sports injury. I enjoy writing about things I'm working on and try to share some interesting things I discover on my blog.

Feel free to get in touch if any of the posts catch your interest!
